By GM on Wednesday, November 11, 2009 - 11:28 am:

Sifting through the screenshots on Joystiq, I managed to find out a few things:

-The game is definitely a localization of MFDS2.

-BOMBA stands for Borgan Monster Battle Academy, presumably Association also.

-The assistant's English name is Cleo.

-The lab admin's English name is Pharma.

-Abisu's English name is Abyss.

-The monster count is the same, 272.


I can't remember off-hand, but are those book entries the same as the ones in MR4 or Evo?

I'll refresh him on the situation. Soon, Ms.Claire, you'll have me and my sister to work with. Remember this, BOMBA stands for "Borgon Monster Battle Academy." The lab lady's name is Pharma. I don't know the meanie's name, because the screenshots call him Cleo. I'm guessing he's referring to Claire, or the Monster in the screenshot.

By GM on Thursday, November 12, 2009 - 01:28 pm:

MRDS will have both local and online PvP battles.

By Lisa Shock on Thursday, November 12, 2009 - 04:05 pm:

Yes, you'll be able to play via DS online pretty much anytime you want, granting that someone else is online to play against you. And, there's local wifi play as well. (IIRC, you need to be within 200 feet of the other player for local wifi to work)

By GM on Friday, November 13, 2009 - 10:19 am:

Plenty of video game message boards already do this, so it couldn't hurt to give it a try.

We could always make a temp thread in the MRDS section where people could post their FCs then copy them to a more permanent location. Members could also post personal updates in that thread if their codes changed for whatever reason.

A matchmaking thread would probably be too taxing and costly, so the chatroom would be the best place for people to meet up and organize battles.

By GM on Saturday, November 14, 2009 - 06:57 am:

By Subster on Wednesday, November 18, 2009 - 08:56 am:

The release dates in the system work like this: If it says it's coming out on the 1st of the month, then it's always a guess. It says Feb 1, 2010 which means Gamestop is guessing for Feb release, but I'd stick to the March release date that is stated by all the sources in this thread.
